display_long_description:
Enter the highest rated art studio on Quest and discover the relaxing world of oil painting. Vermillion offers a lifelike painting experience with realistic paint behavior, a high resolution canvas, all artist's brushes, and a long list of features.

[media]

Start painting right away with the paint-by-numbers packs, paint along with your favorite YouTube artists using the built-in web browser, or learn to paint from (new) friends in multiplayer!

# New: Take reference photos directly with your Quest 3(S), and optionally turn them into paint-by-numbers templates!

# Features
[media]
- Lifelike color mixing, with multiple pre-made palettes 🎨
- Crystal clear high resolution canvas
- Paint by numbers (PBN) packs
- Generate PBN outlines and palette from your own images
- Paint within lines assistance on PBN
- In-game browser including canvas projector
- Adjustable color blending on the canvas
- Eye dropper tool
- Frame & mount your paintings in your own home or in VR
- Four player online multiplayer
- Co-located multiplayer in MR
- Impasto: Thick oil paint that can be shaped on canvas
- Undo/redo
- Re-orderable layers
- Local file support for reference photos
- Three virtual studio environments and MR mode
- Easy image export
- Logitech MX Ink fully supported

# Many artist's brushes, all included as standard
[media]
Regrip brushes any way and any where you like!


Artwork in the screenshots by Gladski, Chad Munn and Mistkinya.
